    BeginDelete(IZonesOperations, String, String, String, String)

    Removes a DNS zone from a resource group.

    public static ZoneDeleteResult BeginDelete(this IZonesOperations operations, string resourceGroupName, string zoneName, string ifMatch = null, string ifNoneMatch = null)<ExtensionAttribute>
Public Shared Function BeginDelete(operations As IZonesOperations, resourceGroupName As String, zoneName As String, ifMatch As String = Nothing, ifNoneMatch As String = Nothing) As ZoneDeleteResult

    Parameters

    • operations
      IZonesOperations
      IZonesOperations

      The operations group for this extension method.

    • resourceGroupName
      String
      String

      The name of the resource group.

    • zoneName
      String
      String

      The name of the zone without a terminating dot.

    • ifMatch
      String
      String

      Defines the If-Match condition. The delete operation will be performed only if the ETag of the zone on the server matches this value.

    • ifNoneMatch
      String
      String

      Defines the If-None-Match condition. The delete operation will be performed only if the ETag of the zone on the server does not match this value.
